Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
ModuleDescription: The main focus of this module is the completion of a major project of community outreach. The project should in some way be connected to the studentâ€™s future goals beyond graduation. The student(s) enrolled will develop the project and therefore will be unique by design. Students will identify a faculty mentor to guide them in the project production.
Prerequisite: Musical Pathways, Leading and Guiding through Music.
